channel.title: Decent Construction
channel.description:
Thought i'd take my hand at making a decent construction system on a 317
First off we have the necessary interfaces ~ which are made from scratch and no interface editing/making programs)
Furniture Building Interface [img]http://i.imgur.com/k5Xj95H.png[/img]
completely flexible, can hold up to 4 item requirements per buildable object up to 8 buildable objects at the same time
Room Creation Interface ([URL=http://img547.imageshack.us/img547/7527/6f97e118b8f24c35b788cd8.png]old version[/URL]) [img]http://i.imgur.com/HMKL4pO.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/1wPiqAm.png[/img]
NEXT onto the actual area itself
Starting setup area [img]http://i.imgur.com/7rFhklP.png[/img]
Area sizes depending on level 3x3 for level 1 (currently have it set to read as level 1 by default since I haven't added it as a real skill yet) [img]http://i.imgur.com/Mhwb3K6.png[/img][img]http://img138.imageshack.us/img138/6931/b9d29ee6a3f94ed6a20c02a.png[/img]
and something I can't show with pictures but if anyone has tried to make construction, the walking around region issue is fixed (if you walked and hit a new region, it would cancel all the custom regions and show the original maps, and if you didn't fix it properly, it would then rebuild everything in the wrong spots, currently it'll rebuild and in the proper locations )
will update thread as more progress is made
TODO list
[ul][li]building rooms (started) http://img708.imageshack.us/img708/5482/1b23795944e04407bf26b4f.png[/li] [li]room rotation[/li] [li]object creation[/li] [li]building mode[/li] [li]live mode (no building objects)[/li] [li]room & object saving[/li][/ul]

item.title: Decent Construction
item.dc:creator: @Cruel_Truth Cruel Truth
item.description:
@Cruel_Truth wrote:

I mean I never really supported “moderators” I always labeled them as “Server Helpers” for that very reason. You want a rank, you going to deserve your rank.

A regular moderator just sits at the bank or something pretending to do something when really he isn’t. Which I hate, just because you get ranked does not mean you don’t still play!

Anywho enough rambling about idiotic rank systems…

Read full topic

item.description:

[/quote][/quote]
well i suppose it was originally delta back in the day

Cruel Truth:

Silab you just earned my respect. Actually putting the staff to work!

of course, staff love bitch work. i won’t force them to do it if they don’t want to though. it’s more of a “who wants to do bitch work?”

item.title: Decent Construction
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

Cruel Truth:

in the original interface was the price needed to build a room so green?

not sure, interface i saw it was yellow i think
so i think it’s like this
yellow if you don’t have the money but have the level
green if money + level
red if don’t have the level

not sure about that quite yet

edit: added level checking to furniture building interface
( for all testing, i’ll be using 1 construction as the default level )

Read full topic

also, update: started room constructing [the preview when building a new room, you’ll be able to rotate to your liking (not yet)]
(still need to map out all hotspots, chapel mapped out)

[/quote]Add a floor.[/quote]

is it suppose to have the floor when you’re choosing to build the room? like… the time when your making the rotation and what not, i don’t think it’s suppose to even show the walls

It came with a source release, I remember being a dev thread as well. But its prob almost a year ago
[/quote]
